channel.title: Ossindex Service Client on Sonatype OSS Index: Public
channel.description: Recent content in Ossindex Service Client on Sonatype OSS Index: Public

item.title: Client
item.description: Provides a simple Java client to communicate with Sonatype OSS Index. Transports A few options for different transports are provided. HttpUrlConnectionTransport The HttpUrlConnectionTransport makes use of standard JRE HttpUrlConnection. HttpClientTransport The HttpClientTransport makes use of Apache HttpClient. Marshalling The default marshalling library used is Google Gson.
